A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The only good thing about this movie is that every scene ends in a way you don't expect. I think Disney's intentions are to make more money by broadening everything in all possible directions. A kind of a reboot that will kill all ties with the past of Star Wars: the force is in everyone\, there is no chosen one\, there will be no jedi but anyone can act like a jedi if just believes in the force etc. This movie just leaves every possibility open\, but it kills the essence of Star Wars. I even think the prequels were much better than TLJ\, at least their story had some meaning and intention to bind to episode IV. I hate this movie it is just another Holywood disaster that pushes us away from theaters and towards TV series.
